plot: When a widow's six children are abducted by a witch who trades the souls of children for her immortality; the widow must venture deep into the forbidden woods to confront the evil before her children are trapped in wax for all eternity.
title: Children of Wax
plot_es: When a widow's six children are abducted by a witch who trades the souls of children for her immortality; the widow must venture deep into the forbidden woods to confront the evil before her children are trapped in wax for all eternity.
plot_en: When a widow's six children are abducted by a witch who trades the souls of children for her immortality; the widow must venture deep into the forbidden woods to confront the evil before her children are trapped in wax for all eternity.
